name: Scare-Away Camp
description:
Scare-Away Camp is a low-poly first-person survival horror game where you play as a ghost stuck on the wrong side of the veil. You must collect pages to an ancient tome that will help you return home. Unfortunately, a group of teenage ghost hunters prowl the campsite, and their flashlights are set to kill. Scare them away, grab the pages before sunrise, and complete the ritual to escape in Scare-Away Camp.

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Mouse - Look
  • Left click - SCARE!
  • Spacebar - TERRIFY!
  • Escape - Leave game
Background

Scare-Away Camp was created by Christopher Butcher for Ian Sundstrum's Game Production I class at Indiana University in Bloomington between April 7th & May 5th, 2020. Most assets used are free from the Unity Asset Store.
